The universal grids. Defense Mapping Agency, Fairfax, VA, USA, 1989. URL: http://earth-info.nga.mil/GandG/publications/.

J. A. Comastri and J. G. Junior. Topografia aplicada. Editora UFV, Viçosa, MG, 1 edition, 2004.

Marco Falcone, Philippe Erhard, and Hein Guenter W. Galileo. In E.D. Kaplan and C.J. Hegarty, editors, Understanding GPS, pages 559–594. Artech House, 2006. URL: http://pt.scribd.com/doc/57135596/208/Other-Satellite-Navigation-Systems$\#$outer\_page\_618 acessado em 12/08/2012.

F.G. Lemoine, S. C. Kenyon, J. K. Factor, R.G. Trimmer, N. K. Pavlis, D. S. Chinn, C. M. Cox, S. M. Klosko, S. B. Luthcke, M. H. Torrence, Y. M. Wang, R. G. Williamson, E. C. Pavlis, R. H.
